Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I believe we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us. I am proposing to sell the product to you for $95. This price not only reflects the product's worth but also allows for a fair transaction. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95.
